chunk:
Estee Lauder Nutritious Radiant Essence Lotion

Brand: Estée Lauder

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water, Propanediol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sucrose (Organic Brown Sugar), Lactobacillus Ferment, Porphyridium Cruentum Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caffeine, Camellia sinensis (Green tea) Leaf extract, Sodium

Cruentum Extract, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Caffeine, Camellia sinensis (Green tea) Leaf extract, Sodium Citrate, Zinc PCA, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Citric Acid, Cucumis Sativus

sinensis (Green tea) Leaf extract, Sodium Citrate, Zinc PCA, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Dilauramidoglutamide Lysine, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Citric Acid, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Extract, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract
Directions: Pat on with fingertips or cotton pad. AM and PM.
